mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FS_CLDR ( CLDR_ID, CLDR_NM, CLDR_COLOR_VAL, COMP_ID, USER_ID, COLSE_YN, SHRE_YN, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{cldrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cldrNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cldrColorVal, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shreYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT SCHED_ID, CLDR_ID, SCHED_NM, SCHED_NM AS TITLE, CONCAT(START_YMD,'T', LEFT(START_TM, 2), ':', RIGHT(START_TM, 2)) AS START, CONCAT(END_YMD,'T', LEFT(END_TM, 2), ':', RIGHT(END_TM, 2)) AS END, FST_FRMIGR_ID, START_TM, END_TM, APNT_PLC FROM FS_SCHED WHERE START_YMD >= #{startYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND END_YMD <= #{endYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FS_SCHED ( CLDR_ID, SCHED_NM, START_YMD, END_YMD, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE, FST_FRMIGR_ID, LST_MODR_ID, START_TM, END_TM, RPET_YN, RPET_END_YMD, RPET_TYPE, RPET_CYC, APNT_PLC, MEMO_CONT ) VALUES ( #{cldrId, javaType=STRING, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schedNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), NOW(), #{fstFrmigrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstModrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpetYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpetEndYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpetType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpetCyc, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{apntPlc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memoCont, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
